newsitem.title: USA: Software Spectrum sees Q3 shr below $0.20.
newsitem.headline: Software Spectrum sees Q3 shr below $0.20.

text.p: Software Spectrum Inc on Friday said it estimated its earnings in the fiscal third quarter ended December 31 at less than $.20 per share.
For the same period last year, the company reported $0.62 a share. Analysts on average estimated the company would earn $0.62 a share in the most recent quarter, according to a First Call survey.
The company, a supplier of microcomputer software and technology services, said it expected record sales of $240 million.
"Profitability for the quarter was negatively affected by an operating loss of approximately $1.8 million in the Asia/Pacific market," it said.
"Also, the company incurred approximately $600,000 of residual transition costs associated with acquisitions completed by the company in the first quarter of this fiscal year," it said.
